1.caption_en:
Six-section slide summarizing a Platform Architecture guide, with numbered headings and brief descriptions for Intro, Best Practice Use Cases, Guiding Principles, Platform Architecture Framework, Platform Architecture Canvas, and Assessment. The layout is a three-column grid with paired items in each column.

{
  "artifact_type": "slide",
  "title": "Platform Architecture Overview",
  "language": "en",
  "layout": "three-column grid with two rows",
  "background_color": "teal/cyan",
  "primary_text_color": "white",
  "number_color": "dark gray",
  "sections": [
    {
      "number": "01",
      "title": "INTRO",
      "description": "Successful platform businesses leverage data and a modern IT infrastructure",
      "position": "top-left",
      "order": 1
    },
    {
      "number": "02",
      "title": "BEST PRACTICE USE CASES",
      "description": "Examples of best-in-class / modern IT Architectures for platforms",
      "position": "bottom-left",
      "order": 2
    },
    {
      "number": "03",
      "title": "GUIDING PRINCIPLES",
      "description": "Guiding Principles of building a modern IT infrastructure",
      "position": "top-center",
      "order": 3
    },
    {
      "number": "04",
      "title": "PLATFORM ARCHITECTURE FRAMEWORK",
      "description": "Guiding Principles of building a modern IT infrastructure",
      "position": "bottom-center",
      "order": 4
    },
    {
      "number": "05",
      "title": "PLATFORM ARCHITECTURE CANVAS",
      "description": "Intro and How-To of using the Platform Architecture Canvas",
      "position": "top-right",
      "order": 5
    },
    {
      "number": "06",
      "title": "ASSESSMENT",
      "description": "A checklist for your architecture",
      "position": "bottom-right",
      "order": 6
    }
  ],
  "notes": "Headings use bold/uppercase; descriptive lines are shorter, left-aligned under each heading."
}
